thread.title: G&D Integrated Receives Superior BROWZ Rating
thread.title_full: G&D Integrated Receives Superior BROWZ Rating - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: G&D Integrated Receives Superior BROWZ Rating
text:
G&D Integrated
NAPERVILLE, Ill. , Sept. 14, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- G&D Integrated announced today that it has received a 2015 BROWZ score of 100% or an "A" Superior rating. This is the second year in a row the company has received a Superior rating from the organization, in conjunction with many of their large OEM supplier reporting system requirements.
BROWZ is a leading supplier qualification solution for supply chain risk mitigation and serves a broad range of industries. BROWZ tracks and certifies supplier compliance in a variety of areas including insurance, hiring, risk management programs, workforce and safety statistics. Organizations utilize this information as a decision support tool when purchasing services and goods from suppliers.
G&D Integrated has been a member of BROWZ since 2006, and the application is updated annually to ensure compliance with primary customer requirements. "Year after year at G&D, we have demonstrated improvement and sustainability in our BROWZ scores proving our commitment to meeting or exceeding customer expectations and our excellence as a supply chain partner," said Mark London , vice president of sales and marketing at G&D Integrated.
ABOUT G&D INTEGRATED
G&D Integrated is a specialized provider of transportation and logistics services and has over 100 years of experience advancing innovative global supply chain solutions. Headquartered in Morton, IL , the company provides domestic transportation, contract logistics, and supply chain services to a variety of industries and employs 1,000 employees at over 20 facilities across North America . For more information, visit www.gdintegrated.com .
